plot: This beautifully choreographed compilation film invites us on a meditative walk through a not-so-distant past, in the spirit of writer Robert Walser.
title: All This Can Happen
plot_es: This beautifully choreographed compilation film invites us on a meditative walk through a not-so-distant past, in the spirit of writer Robert Walser.
plot_en: This beautifully choreographed compilation film invites us on a meditative walk through a not-so-distant past, in the spirit of writer Robert Walser.
